title: BBC Local Live: Essex on Wednesday, 25 May 2016 - BBC News
summary: case of man who disappeared a year ago today is being treated as murder , police say .
teenager arrested in south ockendon acid attack probe .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: that 's it from us at essex live - sadly we did n't get the sunshine we were hoping for today
good news though , we 'll be back tomorrow morning from 08:00 to bring a smile to your face with the latest news , sport , weather and travel for the county .
have a great evening .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: weather : cloudy tonight , warm sunshine tomorrow
text: it 'll be rather cloudy but a mainly dry night across the county .
however , a few clearer breaks are possible in the south .
minimum temperature : 7c ( 45f ) .
early low cloud will disperse tomorrow morning .
then it will be mainly dry with variable amounts of cloud and sunny spells .
highs of 18c ( 64f ) .
you can get the latest forecast for your area at bbc weather .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: colchester united 's drey wright signs new one-year contract
text: colchester united winger drey wright has signed a new one-year contract with the league two-bound club .
the 21-year-old made 13 appearances this season , but started only once in a goalless draw against shrewsbury .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: in the news : family of chris may 'need answers ' 'human cargo ' made cries for help
text: good afternoon , here are the top stories from essex live :
author: Nick Alliker
BBC Essex

documents.title: family of chris may 'need answers '
text: the family of chris may say they `` need answers '' to his death , which is now being treated as a murder investigation one year after he first disappeared .
look east reporter richard daniel has been to meet his mother lorraine may and sisters charlene and gemma who are still struggling to come to terms with his disappearance .

documents.title: john says he 's caught bigger - so are stingray common in essex ?
text: john says this is n't the first time he has caught a large stingray off the essex coast , which may seem a bit unusual if you 're not a keen angler .
however , certain breeds are common in british waters and rays around the world thrive in habitats such as the sea , estuaries , rivers and streams , according to bbc nature .
if you 're unnerved by the famous barbed stinger on the tail , it 's only used in self-defence , often when they are stepped on in shallow waters .
here 's some nhs advice if you 're ever stung .

documents.title: 'massive ' stingray caught off the coast of st osyth
text: just when you thought it was safe to go back in the water
check out this hefty 45lb ( 20.4kg ) stingray that was landed off the coast of st osyth on monday morning by fisherman john popplewell .
`` it was returned alive and kicking after the photograph !
we just had to mind out for its venomous tail , '' he said .

documents.title: tilbury docks people-smuggling trial : 'human cargo ' sealed in container
text: `` human cargo '' sealed inside a container brought into the uk made cries for help which was heard by port workers , a jury heard .
meet singh kapoor was found dead in the container being transported from belgium to tilbury in august 2014 .
he was one of 35 afghan sikhs in the container , basildon crown court was told .
northern irish lorry drivers stephen mclaughlin , 36 , and martin mcglinchey , 49 , deny conspiring to smuggle illegal immigrants into the uk .
the trial continues .
author: Laurence Cawley
BBC News

documents.title: video : chris may murder probe
text: let 's return to the story of chris may , whose disappearance a year ago is now being investigated as a murder .
look east reporter richard daniel has been to the village of fairstead where the 28-year-old 's car was found .

documents.title: second owl hatches on live webcam
text: before reading this next post , i must warn you you 'll probably spend the next few hours glued to watching a live feed of an owl in a nest box
that 's because a second chick has been born , and it was caught hatching on the essex wildlife trust 's live barn owl webcam .
if you 've only just heard about this you have n't missed all the action , as one egg is still to hatch and you can watch the feed here .

documents.title: help an essex commuter find her lost sapphire engagement ring # findthesapphire
text: this engagement ring belongs to a woman called sarah .
sadly on her way to work today the sapphire fell out of it and now she needs your help to track it down .
she was on the 08:18 train from colchester to chelmsford and it was at some point on that journey the stone disappeared .
`` it has such happy memories of the day we got engaged , which was at colchester zoo next to the penguin enclosure , '' sarah told me .
`` the thought that chris chose this ring specifically for me means a great deal and i ca n't imagine being without it . ''
share on social media using # findthesapphire and hopefully we can get it back to sarah !
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: engineers en route to assess c2c line problem
text: # purfleet engineers are en route to site to assess the problem .
apologies for the disruption .
updates to follow .
@ twitterid

documents.title: rail delays after object gets caught on overhead wires at purfleet
text: there are delays of up to 45 minutes on c2c services between fenchurch street and grays due to an object being caught on the overhead electric wires at purfleet .
trains may be delayed or cancelled until 15:00 .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: can we have some sunshine please ?
text: it 's looking a bit grey around essex today

documents.title: your inquisitive otters at colchester zoo
text: thanks to alan conran who emailed us this photo of some rather inquisitive otters at colchester zoo .
he said they are `` probably wondering why everyone is lined up staring at them ! ''
share your photos with us using # esxlive .

documents.title: weather : cloudy and feeling chilly this lunchtime
text: it 's set to be a cloudy and chilly afternoon .
most places will remain dry though .
maximum temperature : 13c ( 55f ) .
if you 're heading out you 'll find the latest forecast for your area at bbc weather .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: in the news : chris may murder probe arrest in 'unprovoked ' suspected acid attack
text: good afternoon .
if you 're just joining us , here are the stories we 've covered on essex live so far :
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: stuck on the m11 earlier ? here 's why
text: there have been no reports of any injuries
traffic block released by # trafficofficers , thanks to fire crews @ twitterid all lanes now open # m11 ( n ) j6 .
# m25 # essex

documents.title: university staff offered 'no overtime or extra rewards '
text: the vice president of the local university and college union explained to me why some staff at the university of essex are walking out for two days .
prof peter patrick said : `` we 're technically on a 36-hour work week , but most of the academics i know work more than 50 hours and there 's no overtime or extra rewards '' .
the universities and colleges employers association called the action `` disappointing '' , saying the pay offer is a good one .
it maintained the weighting of the offer means the worst paid university staff will get a rise of more than 5 % .
author: Richard Smith
BBC Essex

documents.title: essex university staff strike over pay
text: i 've been to the university of essex 's wivenhoe campus where a strike is taking place .
members of the university and college union are walking out for two days in a nationwide pay dispute .
author: Richard Smith
BBC Essex

documents.title: images of burns suffered by acid attack victims at south ockendon railway station
text: family members of two boys burned in the suspected acid attack in south ockendon released these images on facebook in an appeal for information .
they have since been shared thousands of times .
billy milne ( below ) suffered burns to his nose , eyebrow area and around his right ear .
meanwhile , tyrone terry ( below ) also has burn marks on his face .

documents.title: boy , 17 , arrested over south ockendon suspected acid attack
text: we 've now got some more news to tell you about that has just come in this morning
a 17-year-old boy has been arrested after five teenagers were left burned in a suspected acid attack at south ockendon railway station on sunday morning .
one of the victims , a boy , 17 , suffered significant burns to the eyes , another was badly burned on the mouth and tongue , while three others were left with minor injuries .
british transport police said the suspect from dagenham contacted the force and is helping with its enquiries .

documents.title: essex police : how to contact for the force with information about chris may
text: anyone with information about the chris may case is asked to contact the investigation team on 101 or email : scdappeals @ essex.pnn.police.uk .
alternatively , you can contact crimestoppers on 0800 555 111 or via an anonymous reporting form at crimestoppers-uk.org .

documents.title: chris may 'whereabouts ' letter transcript
text: this is the transcript in full of one of four letters received by police from an anonymous author which claims to know the whereabouts of chris may .
two other letters were determined to be hoaxes by officers .

documents.title: chris may 'a loving son , brother and uncle '
text: chris may 's disappearance left a `` huge hole in his family '' , said the detective investigating the case .

`` they have been without answers for the last year and i am determined to do as much as i possibly can to bring closure to them and find out what happened to him , '' said det ch insp marina ericsson .

`` to lose a loved one in any circumstances is difficult , but to have so many unanswered questions for so long is a heartbreaking position to be in , and one i hope someone will be able to help me rectify for his family . ''

documents.title: chris may : the story so far
text: here 's what we have learned so far on the chris may case :
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: map of chris may 's last known journey
text: this map , released by essex police , shows chris may 's last known journey .

documents.title: four anonymous letters received claiming to know chris ' whereabouts
text: four letters have been sent by anonymous authors to police claiming to know information about chris ' whereabouts , and suggested he had come to harm .
two of the letters have been proven to be hoaxes .
but one of the other two letters claims the 28-year-old `` had to go missing as there is a heavy drug firm after him as he owes them money '' .
`` he will contact his family soon when he thinks it 's safe he said he loves them all but is not in good mind state who can help '' , it read .

documents.title: chris may 's last movements captured on cctv
text: essex police has released cctv and of chris may 's final movements on 25 may 2015 .
09:38 : chris ' silver vw golf is captured on cctv travelling along colchester road towards witham town centre .
09:53 ( displayed time 09:59 ) : his silver vw golf is captured on cctv on witham road , white notley , travelling in the general direction of braintree .
10:25 : chris ' car is involved in a crash with a passing vehicle and trailer , resulting in damage to the offside of the vehicle .
11:30 : the car is found parked facing into troy 's chase footpath , fairstead .
the wing mirror is bent in on offside of the car .

documents.title: 'strong likelihood ' drugs linked to chris may 's death
text: missing man chris may was a drug user and dealt in ecstasy , cocaine and mephedrone , according to det ch insp marina ericsson , who added : `` there is a strong likelihood that chris ' involvement with drugs is linked to his death . ''
there are a number of questions i still need to answer and i am appealing for the public 's help to get that information .
how was he killed ?
where ?
who by ?
and where is his body ? ''

documents.title: chris may : from missing person to murder inquiry
text: the fact that the case of chris may has been reclassified from a missing person inquiry to an `` unsolved homicide '' only emerged after the bbc found the case listed in a freedom of information request response from a member of the public .
it shows the case was being treated as a homicide as far back as february , though police made no announcement of that fact .
essex police said the information was withheld from the public as part of the investigation .

documents.title: missing chris may case now treated as murder probe
text: the disappearance of a man last seen a year ago is now being treated as a murder case , it has emerged .
chris may , 28 , was last seen at his home in kelvedon on 25 may in 2015 .
his volkswagen golf was found abandoned about 10 miles away in the village of fairstead .

documents.title: good morning
text: good morning and welcome to essex live .
we start this morning with the news that the disappearance of chris may from kelvedon last seen a year ago today is now being treated as a murder case .
more on that shortly .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live
